variable.name: content
variable.expression: groovyScript("def params = _2.collect {【+it+ = {}】}.join(, ); return \ + _1 + () called with exception = + (params.empty ? : params) + \, methodName(), methodParameters()")

template.name: logm
template.description: Log method name and its arguments

variable.name: content
variable.expression: groovyScript(def params = _2.collect {【+it+ = {}】}.join(, ); return \ + _1 + () called with parameters = + (params.empty ? : params) + \, methodName(), methodParameters())
